item.title: 一名 7 岁女孩的不幸身亡让人们开始关注海滩安全，特别是在沙滩上玩耍时的安全。以下是专家们为如何保证孩子和大人在沙滩上的安全而提供的建议：
item.description:
The tragic death of a 7-year-old girl has put a spotlight on beach safety, specifically when it comes to playing in the sand.

Here are tips from experts for how to keep kids and adults alike safe at the beach: https://t.co/ncNhaRAwkD

— ABC News (@ABC) February 24, 2024

item.title: 最新发布的一份报告显示，纽约市一半以上的居民，包括四分之一的儿童，生活在贫困或低收入之中。
item.description:
More than half of New York City residents, including a quarter of all children, live in poverty or are low-income, according to a newly released report. https://t.co/400hOz4WOZ

— ABC News (@ABC) February 24, 2024

item.title: 根据美国疾病预防控制中心（CDC）的数据，从 2019-2021 学年到 2022-2023 学年，全国麻腮风疫苗覆盖率下降了 2%，这意味着全国约有 25 万名幼儿园儿童面临感染麻疹的风险。
item.description:
National MMR coverage has dropped 2% from the 2019-2021 school year to the 2022-2023 school year, which means approximately 250,000 kindergartners are at risk for measles infection around the country, according to the CDC. https://t.co/EHwZWqBlZD

— ABC News (@ABC) February 24, 2024

item.title: 现年 99 岁的前总统吉米-卡特（Jimmy Carter）是第一位在世时获得白宫官方圣诞饰品殊荣的美国总统。
item.description:
Former Pres. Jimmy Carter has another distinction to his name.

The 99-year-old is the first of the U.S. presidents to be honored with an official White House Christmas ornament while still living. https://t.co/GbkHjKoKZb

— ABC News (@ABC) February 24, 2024

item.title: Lele Pons 最近以最有趣的方式与她的 "与星共舞 "家人团聚。
item.description:

item.title: 一名联邦法官正在考虑继续扣押被控向联邦调查局谎报总统乔-拜登的前联邦调查局线人亚历山大-斯米尔诺夫（Alexander Smirnov）候审。
item.description:
A federal judge is considering keeping Alexander Smirnov, the former FBI informant charged with lying to the bureau about President Joe Biden, detained pending trial. https://t.co/WFHf8zLqAu

— ABC News (@ABC) February 24, 2024

item.title: 美国国家航空航天局（NASA）本周宣布，正在招募合格人员参加为期一年的 "红色星球 "模拟任务。
item.description:
NASA is recruiting qualified individuals to participate in a yearlong mission on a simulated version of the Red Planet, the agency announced this week. https://t.co/p5JFjCO3cx

— ABC News (@ABC) February 24, 2024

item.title: 一系列创纪录的暴雨袭击了加利福尼亚的死亡谷，并为曼利湖补充了水源，在此之后，皮划艇运动员一直在地球上最干旱的地方之一划船。
item.description:
Kayakers have been paddling in one of the driest places on Earth after a series of record rainstorms battered California’s Death Valley and replenished Lake Manly. https://t.co/s4fTJSBEFK

— ABC News (@ABC) February 24, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：动物园称，逃离中央公园动物园后备受关注的 "世界上最有名的猫头鹰 "弗拉科已经死亡：
item.description:
JUST IN: Flaco, the "most famous owl in the world" that captured attention after escaping the Central Park Zoo, has died, the zoo says.

Read more: https://t.co/mlFTGnoQSw pic.twitter.com/c4kXCAP02d

— ABC News (@ABC) February 24, 2024

item.title: 专家们说，拜登政府的最新一轮制裁虽然值得欢迎，但不太可能产生重大影响，因为俄罗斯仍在继续颠覆西方最坏的预期后果。
item.description:
While the latest round of sanctions from the Biden administration is welcome, it's unlikely to have a significant impact as Russia continues to subvert the worst of West's intended consequences, experts say. https://t.co/XX3bTPx5Iz

— ABC News (@ABC) February 24, 2024

item.title: 前总统唐纳德-特朗普要求推迟对 E. Jean Carroll 诽谤案 8,330 万美元的判决。
item.description:

item.title: 美国前总统吉米-卡特的名字又多了一项殊荣。这位 99 岁的老人是第一位在世时就获得白宫官方圣诞饰品殊荣的美国总统。
item.description:
Former President Jimmy Carter has another distinction to his name. The 99-year-old is the first of the U.S. presidents to be honored with an official White House Christmas ornament while still living. https://t.co/d6MjxwpTTt

item.title: 海莉在自己的家乡面临着一场与特朗普对抗的艰苦战斗，她正求助于民主党人--其中许多人是黑人--来帮助她。
item.description:
Haley is facing an uphill battle in her home state against Trump, and is turning to Democrats -- many of whom are Black -- to help her. https://t.co/g3lisyoGJ3

— ABC News (@ABC) February 24, 2024

item.title: 克里斯托弗-贝斯（Christopher Bess）在跟随父亲执教弟弟的高中篮球队时的生动反应集锦录像在网上疯传。
item.description:
Christopher Bess went viral when a highlight tape of his animated reactions while shadowing his dad coaching his brother's high school basketball team went viral. https://t.co/6dkqEj6dTF

— ABC News (@ABC) February 24, 2024

item.title: 法庭文件显示，科罗拉多大学一名学生被指控在寝室内枪杀了包括室友在内的两人，据称他在几周前曾告诉室友，如果再让他倒垃圾，他就 "杀了他"。
item.description:
A University of Colorado student who is accused of gunning down two people in his dorm room, including his roommate, had allegedly told his roommate weeks prior that he'd "kill him" if he was asked to take out the trash again, according to court documents. https://t.co/buWwvfCQlE pic.twitter.com/ePAJzqFPdS

— ABC News (@ABC) February 24, 2024

item.title: 周五，数百名移民被送往圣地亚哥的一个公交车站，而不是作为中转站的接待中心，因为当地资金的耗尽比预期的要早。
item.description:
Hundreds of migrants were dropped off Friday at a San Diego bus stop instead of at a reception center that had been serving as a staging area because it ran out of local funding sooner than expected. https://t.co/emuFpMhqiE

— ABC News (@ABC) February 24, 2024

item.title: 美国国家航空航天局宇航员维克多-格洛弗（Victor Glover）将驾驶这次四人飞行任务，这将是50多年来人类首次飞往月球。他希望 "阿耳特弥斯二号 "任务能够激励人们追寻自己的梦想，到达星空。
item.description:
NASA astronaut Victor Glover will be piloting the four-person mission that will be the first flight to the moon with humans on board in more than 50 years. He's hoping the Artemis II mission will inspire people to follow their dreams of reaching the stars.https://t.co/nOvTxcTpuo

— ABC News (@ABC) February 24, 2024

item.title: 2012 年，史蒂夫-格里格（Steve Greig）的爱犬被车撞死，当时他 "悲痛欲绝"，希望 "能有一些好的结果"。因此，他决定收养老年犬，在它们的晚年给予它们关爱。
item.description:
When his dog died after being hit by a car back in 2012, Steve Greig said he was "devastated" and wanted "something good to come out of it." So, he decided to adopt senior dogs and give them love during their twilight years. https://t.co/qQgIz497rQ pic.twitter.com/H8Re1bjWva

— ABC News (@ABC) February 24, 2024

item.title: 威斯康星州道德委员会建议对一个与前总统特朗普结盟的筹款委员会提出重罪指控，因为该委员会涉嫌密谋为一名特朗普支持的候选人提供不正当的资金来源，而该候选人挑战了特朗普的一位强大的批评者。
item.description:
The Wisconsin Ethics Commission recommends felony charges against a fundraising committee aligned with former Pres. Trump for allegedly conspiring to improperly line the pockets of a Trump-endorsed candidate who challenged a powerful Trump critic. https://t.co/VfPdQmeWHj

— ABC News (@ABC) February 24, 2024

item.title: "今晚看到老朋友闪亮登场"凯蒂-佩里在斯威夫特的 Eras Tour 悉尼站为好友泰勒-斯威夫特助阵。
item.description:

item.title: 调查人员称，一对美国夫妇在加勒比海失踪，据称三位越狱犯在被当局抓获前曾使用他们的游艇跳岛。
item.description:
An American couple has gone missing in the Caribbean after three escaped prisoners allegedly used their yacht to island hop before getting recaptured by authorities, investigators say. https://t.co/PnpiJEddIX

— ABC News (@ABC) February 23, 2024

item.title: 当全世界都在等待奥德修斯从月球表面发送第一批图像时，官方周五宣布，月球着陆器可能出现了失误。
item.description:
As the world waits for Odysseus to send its first images from the moon's surface, officials announced Friday that the moon lander may have had a misstep. https://t.co/QyuMqdasXl

— ABC News (@ABC) February 23, 2024

item.title: 官方消息：一架军用直升机在密西西比州东北部的一次例行训练飞行中坠毁，造成两名国民警卫队队员死亡。
item.description:

— ABC News (@ABC) February 23, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：学校官员说，在佐治亚大学一名跑步的女生被发现死亡一天后，一名谋杀嫌疑人被拘留。这名 22 岁的护理专业学生在跑步后没有回家，被报告失踪。
item.description:
JUST IN: A murder suspect is in custody one day after a woman who went for a run at the University of Georgia was found dead due, school officials said.

The nursing student, 22, had been reported missing when she failed to return home from a run.https://t.co/cASR7zTXCw pic.twitter.com/GYcPLTT5vG

— ABC News (@ABC) February 23, 2024

item.title: 商务部长吉娜-雷蒙多（Gina Raimondo）表示，乌克兰战争已经过去两年，拜登政府对俄罗斯实施的经济制裁正在发挥作用，但她承认还有更多工作要做。
item.description:
Two years into the war on Ukraine, the economic sanctions against Russia leveled by the Biden administration are working, according to Commerce Secretary Gina Raimondo, but she concedes there is more to do. https://t.co/J9y11e0eLt

— ABC News (@ABC) February 23, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：据调查人员称，一对美国夫妇在加勒比海失踪，因为据称有三名越狱囚犯利用他们的游艇跳岛，然后被当局抓获。
item.description:
BREAKING: An American couple has gone missing in the Caribbean after three escaped prisoners allegedly used their yacht to island hop before getting recaptured by authorities, according to investigators.https://t.co/USeN6MNvXA pic.twitter.com/3fjaVaWnvQ

— ABC News (@ABC) February 23, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：陪审团认定全国枪支协会（NRA）对财务管理不善负有责任，并认定该组织前首席执行官韦恩-拉皮埃尔（Wayne LaPierre）腐败地管理着这个美国最著名的枪支权益组织。
item.description:
BREAKING: A jury found the NRA liable for financial mismanagement and found that Wayne LaPierre, the group's former CEO, corruptly ran the nation’s most prominent gun rights group. https://t.co/6ecGNSp76c pic.twitter.com/kYVQ0IcxRk

— ABC News (@ABC) February 23, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：据美国官员证实，北美防空司令部的一架战斗机在犹他州上空 4.3 万至 4.5 万英尺的高度拦截了一个小型气球。
item.description:
BREAKING: A small balloon, as it is being characterized, has been intercepted by a NORAD fighter aircraft over Utah at an altitude of 43,000 to 45,000 feet, a U.S. official confirmed. https://t.co/rwwURVcDuA pic.twitter.com/u9332fbAKv

— ABC News (@ABC) February 23, 2024
